full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/31/2023 TO be filled in, if appropriate.) That I have previously submitted affidavit(s) of support for the following per- son(s): Name Date submitted ESTHER MASTH 1972 A2 in A514 1774 7. (To be filled in, if appropriate.) That I have submitted visa petition(s) to the Immigration and Naturalization Service, on behalf of the following person(s): Name Relationship Date submitted Yrs A. MASTH MOTHER May 1926 8. That I am willing and able to receive, maintain, and support the person(s) listed in item 3 above. That I am ready and willing to deposit a bond, if necessary, with the Immigration and Naturalization Service to guarantee that such person(s) will I become public charges during their stay in the United States, or that they will maintain their nonimmigrant sams if admitted temporarily and will depart prior to the expiration of their authorized stay in the United States 9. That this affidavit is made by me for the purpose of assuring the Immigration and Naturalization Service that the person(s) named in in 3 will not become public charges in the United States. 10. (Complete this black only if the person(s) named in item 3 will be in the U.S. temporarily.) That I do intend do not intend a make specific contributions to the support of the person(s) listed in item 3 above. (If you checked "do increase", indicate the exact nature and duration of the contributions. For example, if you intend to furnish room and board, state for how long and, if money, state the amount in United States dollars and state whether it is to be given in a lump sum, weekly, or monthly and for how long.) will PROVI DO ALL (-Nd OF SUPPERT FOR MUV MOTHER' WITH my BRET-T 11. That my reasons for signing this affidavit are: TO keep her with us Execution of affidavit, You must sign the affidavit in your full, Signature of person preparing form, if other than deponent true, and correct name and affirm or make it under oath. In the United States the affidavit may be sworn to or affirmed before an immigration officer without the payment of fee, or be I declare that this document was prepared by me at the fore a notary public or other officer authorised to administer request of the deponent and is based on all information oaths for general purposes, in which case the official seal or of which certificate of authority to administer oaths must be affixed. SIGNATURE I ht, have any knowledge. hl Outside the United States the affidavit must be sworn to or Date: affirmed before a United States consular or immigration officer. Address: 1567 letter Rd 4236 4/15/156 SUBSCRIBED AND SWORN TO BEFORE ME THIS 15th day of april A.D. 19 76 (Signature of deponent) at 1973 (Signature of officer) naturel (THIS Public of officer) Nature of Evidence of Net Worth To B. Submitted must submit in duplicate evidance of net worth as follows: 1. Statement from an officer of the bank, postal or other financial Institution in which you have deposits giving the following details garding your bank account: (1) Date account opened, (2) Total amount deposited for past year, (3) Present balance. 2. Statement of employer, preferably on his business stationary. showing: (1) Date and nature of employment, (2) Ralacy patd. (1) Whether position temporary or permanent. 3. If self-employed: (1) Copy of last income tax return filed or (2) report of commercial rating concern. 4. List containing serial number and denomination of bonds and name of purchaser. GPO
